AddCasterComponent.title: AddCasterComponent
AddCasterComponent.summary: Adds a component to a production studio.

AddCasterEpisode.title: AddCasterEpisode
AddCasterEpisode.summary: Adds an episode to a production studio.

AddCasterEpisodeGroup.title: AddCasterEpisodeGroup
AddCasterEpisodeGroup.summary: Adds an episode list to a production studio.

AddCasterEpisodeGroupContent.title: AddCasterEpisodeGroupContent
AddCasterEpisodeGroupContent.summary: Adds information about an episode list in a production studio.

AddCasterLayout.title: AddCasterLayout
AddCasterLayout.summary: Adds a layout for a production studio.

AddCasterProgram.title: AddCasterProgram
AddCasterProgram.summary: Adds the episode list for carousel playback in a production studio.

AddCasterVideoResource.title: AddCasterVideoResource
AddCasterVideoResource.summary: Adds an input source to a production studio. The number of input sources is limited by the number of input channels of the production studio.

AddCustomLiveStreamTranscode.title: AddCustomLiveStreamTranscode
AddCustomLiveStreamTranscode.summary: Adds a custom transcoding configuration for a streaming domain.

AddLiveAppRecordConfig.title: AddLiveAppRecordConfig
AddLiveAppRecordConfig.summary: Configure APP recording, with output saved to OSS.

AddLiveAppSnapshotConfig.title: AddLiveAppSnapshotConfig
AddLiveAppSnapshotConfig.summary: Configures the snapshot feature for a streaming domain. The captured snapshots are stored in Object Storage Service (OSS). The configuration takes effect after you restart stream ingest.

AddLiveAudioAuditNotifyConfig.title: AddLiveAudioAuditNotifyConfig
AddLiveAudioAuditNotifyConfig.summary: Configures callbacks for audio moderation results.

AddLiveCenterTransfer.title: AddLiveCenterTransfer
AddLiveCenterTransfer.summary: Adds a configuration of live center stream relay.

AddLiveDetectNotifyConfig.title: AddLiveDetectNotifyConfig
AddLiveDetectNotifyConfig.summary: Configures callbacks for video moderation results. As a result, a callback URL that is used to receive the callback notifications is added.

AddLiveDomain.title: AddLiveDomain
AddLiveDomain.summary: Adds a domain name to ApsaraVideo Live. This operation allows you to add only one domain name at a time.

AddLiveDomainMapping.title: AddLiveDomainMapping
AddLiveDomainMapping.summary: Creates the mapping between a streaming domain and an ingest domain.

AddLiveDomainPlayMapping.title: AddLiveDomainPlayMapping
AddLiveDomainPlayMapping.summary: Maps a sub-streaming domain to a main streaming domain.

AddLivePackageConfig.title: AddLivePackageConfig
AddLivePackageConfig.summary: Adds a live stream encapsulation configuration.

AddLivePullStreamInfoConfig.title: AddLivePullStreamInfoConfig
AddLivePullStreamInfoConfig.summary: Creates a stream pulling configuration for a live stream, which includes parameters such as the origin URL, start time, and end time.

AddLiveRecordNotifyConfig.title: AddLiveRecordNotifyConfig
AddLiveRecordNotifyConfig.summary: Configures recording callbacks for a domain name.

AddLiveRecordVodConfig.title: AddLiveRecordVodConfig
AddLiveRecordVodConfig.summary: Adds a Live-to-VOD configuration to store recordings in the media library of ApsaraVideo VOD.

AddLiveSnapshotDetectPornConfig.title: AddLiveSnapshotDetectPornConfig
AddLiveSnapshotDetectPornConfig.summary: Adds a video moderation configuration for live streams in an application under a domain name.

AddLiveStreamMerge.title: AddLiveStreamMerge
AddLiveStreamMerge.summary: Invoke AddLiveStreamMerge to add primary and backup stream merging configuration.

AddLiveStreamTranscode.title: AddLiveStreamTranscode
AddLiveStreamTranscode.summary: Adds transcoding configurations for a streaming domain.

AddPlaylistItems.title: AddPlaylistItems
AddPlaylistItems.summary: Adds episodes to an episode list.

AddRtsLiveStreamTranscode.title: AddRtsLiveStreamTranscode
AddRtsLiveStreamTranscode.summary: Creates a Real-Time Streaming (RTS) transcoding configuration for a streaming domain.

AddShowIntoShowList.title: AddShowIntoShowList
AddShowIntoShowList.summary: Adds an episode to an episode list.

AddStudioLayout.title: AddStudioLayout
AddStudioLayout.summary: Configures a layout for a virtual studio.

AddTrancodeSEI.title: AddTrancodeSEI
AddTrancodeSEI.summary: Inserts supplemental enhancement information (SEI) to transcoded streams.

BatchDeleteLiveDomainConfigs.title: BatchDeleteLiveDomainConfigs
BatchDeleteLiveDomainConfigs.summary: Deletes the configurations of multiple domain names at a time.

BatchGetOnlineUsers.title: BatchGetOnlineUsers
BatchGetOnlineUsers.summary: Queries whether users are online by UID.

BatchSetLiveDomainConfigs.title: BatchSetLiveDomainConfigs
BatchSetLiveDomainConfigs.summary: Configures multiple domain names at a time.

CancelMuteGroupUser.title: CancelMuteGroupUser
CancelMuteGroupUser.summary: Unmutes members in a message group.

ChangeLiveDomainResourceGroup.title: ChangeLiveDomainResourceGroup
ChangeLiveDomainResourceGroup.summary: Changes the resource group to which a domain name belongs. In this case, you move the domain name from the original resource group to another resource group.

CheckLiveMessageUsersInGroup.title: CheckLiveMessageUsersInGroup
CheckLiveMessageUsersInGroup.summary: Queries whether a user is in an interactive messaging group.

CheckLiveMessageUsersOnline.title: CheckLiveMessageUsersOnline
CheckLiveMessageUsersOnline.summary: Queries whether one or more specified users are online.

CloseLiveShift.title: CloseLiveShift
CloseLiveShift.summary: Disables time shifting for a domain name, or an application or a live stream under the domain name.

CopyCasterSceneConfig.title: CopyCasterSceneConfig
CopyCasterSceneConfig.summary: Applies the configuration of a PVW scene to a PGM scene.

CreateCustomTemplate.title: CreateCustomTemplate
CreateCustomTemplate.summary: Creates a custom stream mixing template.

CreateEventSub.title: CreateEventSub
CreateEventSub.summary: Creates a callback to subscribe to channel or user events.

CreateLiveAIStudio.title: CreateLiveAIStudio
CreateLiveAIStudio.summary: Creates a lightweight virtual studio template.

CreateLivePrivateLine.title: CreateLivePrivateLine
CreateLivePrivateLine.summary: Creates a Global Accelerator (GA) instance and binds it to an acceleration circuit.

CreateLiveRealTimeLogDelivery.title: CreateLiveRealTimeLogDelivery
CreateLiveRealTimeLogDelivery.summary: Configures real-time log delivery for a domain name.

CreateLiveStreamRecordIndexFiles.title: CreateLiveStreamRecordIndexFiles
CreateLiveStreamRecordIndexFiles.summary: Creates an M3U8 index file for a recording in a specified time period.

CreateRoomRealTimeStreamAddress.title: CreateRoomRealTimeStreamAddress
CreateRoomRealTimeStreamAddress.summary: Generates a Real-Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP) ingest URL for a channel.

CreateRtcAsrTask.title: CreateRtcAsrTask
CreateRtcAsrTask.summary: Creates a live subtitle task to transcribe an audio stream to text in real time.

CreateRtcMPUEventSub.title: CreateRtcMPUEventSub
CreateRtcMPUEventSub.summary: Creates a subscription to mixed-stream relay events.

DeleteCasterComponent.title: DeleteCasterComponent
DeleteCasterComponent.summary: Deletes a component in a production studio.

DeleteCasterEpisode.title: DeleteCasterEpisode
DeleteCasterEpisode.summary: Deletes an episode in a production studio.

DeleteCasterEpisodeGroup.title: DeleteCasterEpisodeGroup
DeleteCasterEpisodeGroup.summary: Deletes an episode list in a production studio.

DeleteCasterLayout.title: DeleteCasterLayout
DeleteCasterLayout.summary: Deletes a layout in a production studio.

DeleteCasterProgram.title: DeleteCasterProgram
DeleteCasterProgram.summary: Deletes the episode list for carousel playback in a production studio.

DeleteCasterSceneConfig.title: DeleteCasterSceneConfig
DeleteCasterSceneConfig.summary: Deletes the settings of a scene.

DeleteCasterVideoResource.title: DeleteCasterVideoResource
DeleteCasterVideoResource.summary: Removes an input source from a production studio.

DeleteCustomTemplate.title: DeleteCustomTemplate
DeleteCustomTemplate.summary: Deletes a custom stream mixing template.

DeleteEventSub.title: DeleteEventSub
DeleteEventSub.summary: Deletes a callback that is used to subscribe to channel or user events.

DeleteLiveAppRecordConfig.title: DeleteLiveAppRecordConfig
DeleteLiveAppRecordConfig.summary: Deletes a recording configuration at the application level.

DeleteLiveAppSnapshotConfig.title: DeleteLiveAppSnapshotConfig
DeleteLiveAppSnapshotConfig.summary: Deletes the snapshot configuration for live streams in an application. The deletion takes effect after you restart stream ingest.

DeleteLiveAudioAuditNotifyConfig.title: DeleteLiveAudioAuditNotifyConfig
DeleteLiveAudioAuditNotifyConfig.summary: Deletes the configuration of callbacks for audio moderation results.

DeleteLiveCenterTransfer.title: DeleteLiveCenterTransfer
DeleteLiveCenterTransfer.summary: Deletes a configuration of live center stream relay.

DeleteLiveDetectNotifyConfig.title: DeleteLiveDetectNotifyConfig
DeleteLiveDetectNotifyConfig.summary: Deletes the configuration of callbacks for video moderation results.

DeleteLiveDomain.title: DeleteLiveDomain
DeleteLiveDomain.summary: Removes a domain name from ApsaraVideo Live.

DeleteLiveDomainMapping.title: DeleteLiveDomainMapping
DeleteLiveDomainMapping.summary: Deletes the mapping between a streaming domain and an ingest domain.

DeleteLiveDomainPlayMapping.title: DeleteLiveDomainPlayMapping
DeleteLiveDomainPlayMapping.summary: Deletes the mapping between a main streaming domain and a sub-streaming domain.

DeleteLiveEdgeTransfer.title: DeleteLiveEdgeTransfer
DeleteLiveEdgeTransfer.summary: Deletes the configuration of edge stream relay.

DeleteLiveLazyPullStreamInfoConfig.title: DeleteLiveLazyPullStreamInfoConfig
DeleteLiveLazyPullStreamInfoConfig.summary: Deletes a configuration of triggered stream pulling.

DeleteLiveMessageGroupMessage.title: DeleteLiveMessageGroupMessage
DeleteLiveMessageGroupMessage.summary: Deletes a message that was sent to an interactive messaging group.

DeleteLiveMessageUserMessage.title: DeleteLiveMessageUserMessage
DeleteLiveMessageUserMessage.summary: Deletes a message that is sent to a user.

DeleteLivePrivateLine.title: DeleteLivePrivateLine
DeleteLivePrivateLine.summary: Unbinds a Global Accelerator (GA) instance from an acceleration circuit.

DeleteLiveRealTimeLogLogstore.title: DeleteLiveRealTimeLogLogstore
DeleteLiveRealTimeLogLogstore.summary: Deletes the Logstore that is specified by a configuration of real-time log delivery.

DeleteLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.title: DeleteLiveRealtimeLogDelivery
DeleteLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Deletes the configurations of real-time log delivery for one or more domain names.

DeleteLiveRecordNotifyConfig.title: DeleteLiveRecordNotifyConfig
DeleteLiveRecordNotifyConfig.summary: Deletes the configuration of callbacks for live stream recording under a domain name.

DeleteLiveSnapshotNotifyConfig.title: DeleteLiveSnapshotNotifyConfig
DeleteLiveSnapshotNotifyConfig.summary: Deletes the configuration of snapshot callbacks.

DeleteLiveSpecificStagingConfig.title: DeleteLiveSpecificStagingConfig
DeleteLiveSpecificStagingConfig.summary: Deletes domain configurations in the canary release environment.

DeleteLiveStreamBlock.title: DeleteLiveStreamBlock
DeleteLiveStreamBlock.summary: Deletes a configuration of stream-level region blocking.

DeleteLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig.title: DeleteLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig
DeleteLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig.summary: Deletes the callback configuration for stream ingest under an ingest domain.

DeletePlaylistItems.title: DeletePlaylistItems
DeletePlaylistItems.summary: Removes episodes from an episode list.

DeleteRtcMPUEventSub.title: DeleteRtcMPUEventSub
DeleteRtcMPUEventSub.summary: Deletes a subscription to mixed-stream relay events.

DeleteSnapshotCallbackAuth.title: DeleteSnapshotCallbackAuth
DeleteSnapshotCallbackAuth.summary: Deletes the configuration of authentication for snapshot callbacks.

DeleteStudioLayout.title: DeleteStudioLayout
DeleteStudioLayout.summary: Deletes a layout in a virtual studio.

DescribeAutoShowListTasks.title: DescribeAutoShowListTasks
DescribeAutoShowListTasks.summary: Queries scheduled tasks that are used to start and stop playing an episode list at specified points in time.

DescribeCasterChannels.title: DescribeCasterChannels
DescribeCasterChannels.summary: Queries the channels of a production studio.

DescribeCasterComponents.title: DescribeCasterComponents
DescribeCasterComponents.summary: Queries the components of a production studio.

DescribeCasterConfig.title: DescribeCasterConfig
DescribeCasterConfig.summary: Queries the configurations of a production studio.

DescribeCasterLayouts.title: DescribeCasterLayouts
DescribeCasterLayouts.summary: Queries a specified layout or all layouts of a production studio.

DescribeCasterProgram.title: DescribeCasterProgram
DescribeCasterProgram.summary: Queries the information about the episode list for carousel playback in a production studio.

DescribeCasterSceneAudio.title: DescribeCasterSceneAudio
DescribeCasterSceneAudio.summary: Queries the audio configurations of a scene.

DescribeCasterScenes.title: DescribeCasterScenes
DescribeCasterScenes.summary: Queries the scenes of a production studio.

DescribeCasterStreamUrl.title: DescribeCasterStreamUrl
DescribeCasterStreamUrl.summary: Queries the streaming URLs of a production studio.

DescribeCasterVideoResources.title: DescribeCasterVideoResources
DescribeCasterVideoResources.summary: Queries the input sources of a production studio.

DescribeCasters.title: DescribeCasters
DescribeCasters.summary: Queries the list of production studios.

DescribeChannelParticipants.title: DescribeChannelParticipants
DescribeChannelParticipants.summary: Queries online users in a channel.

DescribeChannelUsers.title: DescribeChannelUsers
DescribeChannelUsers.summary: Queries the details of online users in a channel.

DescribeDomainUsageData.title: DescribeDomainUsageData
DescribeDomainUsageData.summary: Queries the resource usage data of specific domain names in a specified billable region.

DescribeLiveAIStudio.title: DescribeLiveAIStudio
DescribeLiveAIStudio.summary: Queries the virtual studio templates within your Alibaba Cloud account.

DescribeLiveAudioAuditNotifyConfig.title: DescribeLiveAudioAuditNotifyConfig
DescribeLiveAudioAuditNotifyConfig.summary: Queries the configuration of callbacks for audio moderation results.

DescribeLiveCenterStreamRateData.title: DescribeLiveCenterStreamRateData
DescribeLiveCenterStreamRateData.summary: Queries the audio and video frame rates and bitrates of a stream in a live center.

DescribeLiveCenterTransfer.title: DescribeLiveCenterTransfer
DescribeLiveCenterTransfer.summary: Queries the information about a configuration of live center stream relay.

DescribeLiveCertificateDetail.title: DescribeLiveCertificateDetail
DescribeLiveCertificateDetail.summary: Queries the details of a certificate.

DescribeLiveCertificateList.title: DescribeLiveCertificateList
DescribeLiveCertificateList.summary: Queries the certificates of one or more specified domain names or all certificates within your Alibaba Cloud account.

DescribeLiveDelayConfig.title: DescribeLiveDelayConfig
DescribeLiveDelayConfig.summary: Queries the information about a stream delay configuration.

DescribeLiveDelayedStreamingUsage.title: DescribeLiveDelayedStreamingUsage
DescribeLiveDelayedStreamingUsage.summary: Queries the stream delay usage data.

DescribeLiveDetectNotifyConfig.title: DescribeLiveDetectNotifyConfig
DescribeLiveDetectNotifyConfig.summary: Queries the configuration of callbacks for video moderation results.

DescribeLiveDetectPornData.title: DescribeLiveDetectPornData
DescribeLiveDetectPornData.summary: Queries the usage data of content moderation.

DescribeLiveDomainBpsData.title: DescribeLiveDomainBpsData
DescribeLiveDomainBpsData.summary: Queries the bandwidth data for one or more streaming domains.

DescribeLiveDomainBpsDataByLayer.title: DescribeLiveDomainBpsDataByLayer
DescribeLiveDomainBpsDataByLayer.summary: Queries the bandwidth and traffic data by protocol for one or more domain names.

DescribeLiveDomainByCertificate.title: DescribeLiveDomainByCertificate
DescribeLiveDomainByCertificate.summary: Queries the accelerated domain names that match a certificate.

DescribeLiveDomainCertificateInfo.title: DescribeLiveDomainCertificateInfo
DescribeLiveDomainCertificateInfo.summary: Queries certificate information about a domain name.

DescribeLiveDomainConfigs.title: DescribeLiveDomainConfigs
DescribeLiveDomainConfigs.summary: Queries one or more configurations of a domain name.

DescribeLiveDomainDetail.title: DescribeLiveDomainDetail
DescribeLiveDomainDetail.summary: Queries the basic information about a domain name.

DescribeLiveDomainFrameRateAndBitRateDat.title: DescribeLiveDomainFrameRateAndBitRateData
DescribeLiveDomainFrameRateAndBitRateDat.summary: Queries the frame rates and bitrates of all live streams under an ingest domain.

DescribeLiveDomainLimit.title: DescribeLiveDomainLimit
DescribeLiveDomainLimit.summary: Queries the maximum numbers of ingested and transcoded streams for a streaming domain.

DescribeLiveDomainLog.title: DescribeLiveDomainLog
DescribeLiveDomainLog.summary: Queries the address from which you can download the raw access logs of a domain name.

DescribeLiveDomainMapping.title: DescribeLiveDomainMapping
DescribeLiveDomainMapping.summary: Queries the mappings of an ingest domain, a main streaming domain, or a sub-streaming domain.

DescribeLiveDomainMonitoringUsageData.title: DescribeLiveDomainMonitoringUsageData
DescribeLiveDomainMonitoringUsageData.summary: Queries the live monitoring usage data for one or more domain names.

DescribeLiveDomainMultiStreamConfig.title: DescribeLiveDomainMultiStreamConfig
DescribeLiveDomainMultiStreamConfig.summary: Queries the configuration status of dual-stream disaster recovery.

DescribeLiveDomainOnlineUserNum.title: DescribeLiveDomainOnlineUserNum
DescribeLiveDomainOnlineUserNum.summary: Queries the number of online users at a specified point in time for all live streams under a specified domain name.

DescribeLiveDomainPublishErrorCode.title: DescribeLiveDomainPublishErrorCode
DescribeLiveDomainPublishErrorCode.summary: Queries the HTTP status codes that are returned within a specified period of time under an ingest domain.

DescribeLiveDomainPushBpsData.title: DescribeLiveDomainPushBpsData
DescribeLiveDomainPushBpsData.summary: Queries the bandwidth data for one or more ingest domains.

DescribeLiveDomainPushTrafficData.title: DescribeLiveDomainPushTrafficData
DescribeLiveDomainPushTrafficData.summary: Queries the network traffic data for one or more ingest domains.

DescribeLiveDomainPvUvData.title: DescribeLiveDomainPvUvData
DescribeLiveDomainPvUvData.summary: Queries the data of page views (PVs) and unique visitors (UVs) of a streaming domain.

DescribeLiveDomainRealTimeBpsData.title: DescribeLiveDomainRealTimeBpsData
DescribeLiveDomainRealTimeBpsData.summary: Queries the bandwidth data that is collected every minute for one or more domain names.

DescribeLiveDomainRealTimeHttpCodeData.title: DescribeLiveDomainRealTimeHttpCodeData
DescribeLiveDomainRealTimeHttpCodeData.summary: Queries the proportions of HTTP status codes returned for one or more domain names. Data is collected every minute.

DescribeLiveDomainRealTimeTrafficData.title: DescribeLiveDomainRealTimeTrafficData
DescribeLiveDomainRealTimeTrafficData.summary: Queries the network traffic data that is collected in real time for one or more domain names.

DescribeLiveDomainRealtimeLogDelivery.title: DescribeLiveDomainRealtimeLogDelivery
DescribeLiveDomainRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Queries the information about real-time log delivery for a domain name.

DescribeLiveDomainRecordUsageData.title: DescribeLiveDomainRecordUsageData
DescribeLiveDomainRecordUsageData.summary: Queries the numbers of live recording channels and container format conversions.

DescribeLiveDomainSnapshotData.title: DescribeLiveDomainSnapshotData
DescribeLiveDomainSnapshotData.summary: Queries the number of snapshots for one or more streaming domains.

DescribeLiveDomainStagingConfig.title: DescribeLiveDomainStagingConfig
DescribeLiveDomainStagingConfig.summary: Queries the feature configurations of an accelerated domain name in the canary release environment.

DescribeLiveDomainStreamTranscodeData.title: DescribeLiveDomainStreamTranscodeData
DescribeLiveDomainStreamTranscodeData.summary: Queries the transcoding length for one or more domain names.

DescribeLiveDomainTimeShiftData.title: DescribeLiveDomainTimeShiftData
DescribeLiveDomainTimeShiftData.summary: Queries the resource usage data of time shifting for one or more domain names.

DescribeLiveDomainTrafficData.title: DescribeLiveDomainTrafficData
DescribeLiveDomainTrafficData.summary: Queries the network traffic data for one or more domain names.

DescribeLiveEdgeTransfer.title: DescribeLiveEdgeTransfer
DescribeLiveEdgeTransfer.summary: Queries the configuration of edge stream relay.

DescribeLiveHttpsDomainList.title: DescribeLiveHttpsDomainList
DescribeLiveHttpsDomainList.summary: Queries the information about all certificates that you have configured.

DescribeLiveInteractionMetricData.title: DescribeLiveInteractionMetricData
DescribeLiveInteractionMetricData.summary: Queries the metric data of ApsaraVideo Real-time Communication (ARTC).

DescribeLiveIpInfo.title: DescribeLiveIpInfo
DescribeLiveIpInfo.summary: Checks whether a specified IP address belongs to an Alibaba Cloud point of presence (POP).

DescribeLiveLazyPullStreamConfig.title: DescribeLiveLazyPullStreamConfig
DescribeLiveLazyPullStreamConfig.summary: Queries the configurations of triggered stream pulling for a streaming domain.

DescribeLiveMessageGroup.title: DescribeLiveMessageGroup
DescribeLiveMessageGroup.summary: Queries the information about an interactive messaging group.

DescribeLiveMessageGroupBand.title: DescribeLiveMessageGroupBand
DescribeLiveMessageGroupBand.summary: Queries the mute status of users.

DescribeLivePrivateLineAreas.title: DescribeLivePrivateLineAreas
DescribeLivePrivateLineAreas.summary: Queries available access points where acceleration circuits start.

DescribeLivePrivateLineAvailGA.title: DescribeLivePrivateLineAvailGA
DescribeLivePrivateLineAvailGA.summary: Queries the binding information between Global Accelerator (GA) instances and acceleration circuits.

DescribeLiveProducerUsageData.title: DescribeLiveProducerUsageData
DescribeLiveProducerUsageData.summary: Queries the production studio usage data.

DescribeLivePullStreamConfig.title: DescribeLivePullStreamConfig
DescribeLivePullStreamConfig.summary: Queries the stream pulling configurations for a domain name.

DescribeLivePullToPushList.title: DescribeLivePullToPushList
DescribeLivePullToPushList.summary: Queries pulled-stream relay tasks. Fuzzy match is supported.

DescribeLivePushProxyLog.title: DescribeLivePushProxyLog
DescribeLivePushProxyLog.summary: Queries the stream relay logs, which are available for download.

DescribeLivePushProxyUsageData.title: DescribeLivePushProxyUsageData
DescribeLivePushProxyUsageData.summary: Queries the usage data of live center stream relay.

DescribeLiveRealtimeDeliveryAcc.title: DescribeLiveRealtimeDeliveryAcc
DescribeLiveRealtimeDeliveryAcc.summary: Queries the number of real-time log deliveries.

DescribeLiveRealtimeLogAuthorized.title: DescribeLiveRealtimeLogAuthorized
DescribeLiveRealtimeLogAuthorized.summary: Queries the status of authorization for real-time log delivery.

DescribeLiveRecordConfig.title: DescribeLiveRecordConfig
DescribeLiveRecordConfig.summary: Queries all recording configurations of an application for a streaming domain.

DescribeLiveRecordNotifyConfig.title: DescribeLiveRecordNotifyConfig
DescribeLiveRecordNotifyConfig.summary: Queries the configuration of callbacks for live stream recording under a domain name.

DescribeLiveRecordNotifyRecords.title: DescribeLiveRecordNotifyRecords
DescribeLiveRecordNotifyRecords.summary: Queries the recording callback records that are stored in Object Storage Service (OSS).

DescribeLiveShiftConfigs.title: DescribeLiveShiftConfigs
DescribeLiveShiftConfigs.summary: Queries the time shifting configurations of a domain name.

DescribeLiveSnapshotConfig.title: DescribeLiveSnapshotConfig
DescribeLiveSnapshotConfig.summary: Queries the snapshot configurations of a streaming domain.

DescribeLiveSnapshotNotifyConfig.title: DescribeLiveSnapshotNotifyConfig
DescribeLiveSnapshotNotifyConfig.summary: Queries the configuration of snapshot callbacks.

DescribeLiveStreamAuthChecking.title: DescribeLiveStreamAuthChecking
DescribeLiveStreamAuthChecking.summary: Queries the authentication status of an active stream.

DescribeLiveStreamBitRateData.title: DescribeLiveStreamBitRateData
DescribeLiveStreamBitRateData.summary: Queries the frame rates and bitrates of a Real-Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP) stream within a specified time period. You can call this operation to query historical data.

DescribeLiveStreamCount.title: DescribeLiveStreamCount
DescribeLiveStreamCount.summary: Queries the numbers of online source streams and transcoded streams.

DescribeLiveStreamDetailFrameRateAndBitR.title: DescribeLiveStreamDetailFrameRateAndBitRateData
DescribeLiveStreamDetailFrameRateAndBitR.summary: Queries the audio and video frame rates and bitrates of a Real-Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP) stream.

DescribeLiveStreamHistoryUserNum.title: DescribeLiveStreamHistoryUserNum
DescribeLiveStreamHistoryUserNum.summary: Queries the number of historical online users for a live stream.

DescribeLiveStreamMerge.summary: Invoke DescribeLiveStreamMerge to query the primary-standby stream merging configuration.

DescribeLiveStreamMetricDetailData.title: DescribeLiveStreamMetricDetailData
DescribeLiveStreamMetricDetailData.summary: Queries the monitoring data of streams for a specified domain name. Up to 5,000 rows of data can be returned per call.

DescribeLiveStreamMonitorList.title: DescribeLiveStreamMonitorList
DescribeLiveStreamMonitorList.summary: Queries the list of created monitoring sessions.

DescribeLiveStreamPreloadTasks.title: DescribeLiveStreamPreloadTasks
DescribeLiveStreamPreloadTasks.summary: Queries prefetch tasks in the last three days.

DescribeLiveStreamPushMetricDetailData.title: DescribeLiveStreamPushMetricDetailData
DescribeLiveStreamPushMetricDetailData.summary: Queries the stream ingest data of a specified domain name at the application level and the stream level.

DescribeLiveStreamRecordContent.summary: Queries the recordings of a live stream.

DescribeLiveStreamRecordIndexFile.title: DescribeLiveStreamRecordIndexFile
DescribeLiveStreamRecordIndexFile.summary: Queries the information about an index file.

DescribeLiveStreamRecordIndexFiles.summary: Queries all index files within a specific time period.

DescribeLiveStreamSnapshotInfo.title: DescribeLiveStreamSnapshotInfo
DescribeLiveStreamSnapshotInfo.summary: Queries the snapshots that were captured within a specific time period.

DescribeLiveStreamState.title: DescribeLiveStreamState
DescribeLiveStreamState.summary: Queries the status of a stream in real time.

DescribeLiveStreamTranscodeInfo.title: DescribeLiveStreamTranscodeInfo
DescribeLiveStreamTranscodeInfo.summary: Queries the transcoding configurations of a streaming domain.

DescribeLiveStreamTranscodeMetricData.title: DescribeLiveStreamTranscodeMetricData
DescribeLiveStreamTranscodeMetricData.summary: Queries the transcoding data of a specified domain name at the application level and the stream level.

DescribeLiveStreamTranscodeStreamNum.title: DescribeLiveStreamTranscodeStreamNum
DescribeLiveStreamTranscodeStreamNum.summary: Queries the number of transcoded streams in real time.

DescribeLiveStreamsBlockList.title: DescribeLiveStreamsBlockList
DescribeLiveStreamsBlockList.summary: Queries the live streams that are blacklisted under a domain name.

DescribeLiveStreamsControlHistory.summary: Queries the operation history of live streams under a domain name or in an application.

DescribeLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig.title: DescribeLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig
DescribeLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig.summary: Queries the callback configuration for stream ingest under an ingest domain.

DescribeLiveStreamsOnlineList.title: DescribeLiveStreamsOnlineList
DescribeLiveStreamsOnlineList.summary: Queries the information about all active streams under a specified domain name or the active streams of an application under a specified domain name.

DescribeLiveStreamsPublishList.summary: Queries the stream ingest records of a domain name or an application or stream under a domain name.

DescribeLiveStreamsTotalCount.title: DescribeLiveStreamsTotalCount
DescribeLiveStreamsTotalCount.summary: Queries the total number of live streams within a specified time range. Data is collected on a daily basis.

DescribeLiveTagResources.summary: Queries the tags of domain names.

DescribeLiveTopDomainsByFlow.title: DescribeLiveTopDomainsByFlow
DescribeLiveTopDomainsByFlow.summary: Queries the top domain names ranked by traffic.

DescribeLiveUpVideoAudioInfo.title: DescribeLiveUpVideoAudioInfo
DescribeLiveUpVideoAudioInfo.summary: Queries the audio and video data of an ingested stream within a specific period of time.

DescribeLiveUserBillPrediction.title: DescribeLiveUserBillPrediction
DescribeLiveUserBillPrediction.summary: Queries the estimated bills of ApsaraVideo Live in your Alibaba Cloud account.

DescribeLiveUserDomains.title: DescribeLiveUserDomains
DescribeLiveUserDomains.summary: Queries domain names of ApsaraVideo Live in your Alibaba Cloud account.

DescribeLiveVerifyContent.title: DescribeLiveVerifyContent
DescribeLiveVerifyContent.summary: Queries the ownership verification content of a domain name.

DescribeRTSNativeSDKFirstFrameCost.title: DescribeRTSNativeSDKFirstFrameCost
DescribeRTSNativeSDKFirstFrameCost.summary: Queries the information about the factors that cause latency of first frames within a specified period of time.

DescribeRTSNativeSDKFirstFrameDelay.summary: Queries the average latency of first frames within a specified period of time.

DescribeRTSNativeSDKPlayFailStatus.summary: Queries the causes of playback failures that occurred within a specified period of time. The causes are returned in the form of status codes.

DescribeRTSNativeSDKPlayTime.summary: Queries the playback duration within a specified period of time.

DescribeRTSNativeSDKVvData.title: DescribeRTSNativeSDKVvData
DescribeRTSNativeSDKVvData.summary: Queries the total number of playbacks and the number of successful playbacks within a specified period of time.

DescribeRtcCloudRecordingFiles.title: DescribeRtcCloudRecordingFiles
DescribeRtcCloudRecordingFiles.summary: Queries the information about a real-time communication (RTC) cloud-based recording task.

DescribeRtcMPUEventSub.title: DescribeRtcMPUEventSub
DescribeRtcMPUEventSub.summary: Queries information about a subscription to mixed-stream relay events.

DescribeShowList.title: DescribeShowList
DescribeShowList.summary: Queries the details of the episode list.

DescribeStreamLocationBlock.title: DescribeStreamLocationBlock
DescribeStreamLocationBlock.summary: Queries configurations of stream-level region blocking.

DescribeStudioLayouts.summary: Queries one or more layouts of a virtual studio.

DescribeToutiaoLivePlay.summary: Queries the stream pulling information about a live stream of a headline.

DescribeToutiaoLivePublish.summary: Queries the ingest information of a specified live stream that is ingested to Toutiao.

DescribeUpBpsPeakData.title: DescribeUpBpsPeakData
DescribeUpBpsPeakData.summary: Queries the daily peak inbound bandwidth.

DescribeUpBpsPeakOfLine.title: DescribeUpBpsPeakOfLine
DescribeUpBpsPeakOfLine.summary: Queries the daily peak inbound bandwidth of a leased line.

DescribeUpPeakPublishStreamData.title: DescribeUpPeakPublishStreamData
DescribeUpPeakPublishStreamData.summary: Queries the daily peak number of concurrently ingested streams.

DisableLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.title: DisableLiveRealtimeLogDelivery
DisableLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Suspends real-time log delivery for one or more domain names.

EffectCasterUrgent.title: EffectCasterUrgent
EffectCasterUrgent.summary: Switches a scene to the standby resource in a production studio.

EffectCasterVideoResource.title: EffectCasterVideoResource
EffectCasterVideoResource.summary: Updates the standby resource in a specified scene.

EnableLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.title: EnableLiveRealtimeLogDelivery
EnableLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Enables real-time log delivery for one or more domain names.

ForbidLiveStream.title: ForbidLiveStream
ForbidLiveStream.summary: Disables a live stream. You can specify the time when the live stream is resumed.

GetAllCustomTemplates.title: GetAllCustomTemplates
GetAllCustomTemplates.summary: Queries all custom stream mixing templates.

GetCustomTemplate.title: GetCustomTemplate
GetCustomTemplate.summary: Queries the information about a custom stream mixing template.

GetEdgeTranscodeJob.title: GetEdgeTranscodeJob
GetEdgeTranscodeJob.summary: Queries the details of an edge transcoding task.

GetEdgeTranscodeTemplate.title: GetEdgeTranscodeTemplate
GetEdgeTranscodeTemplate.summary: Queries the details of an edge transcoding template.

GetEditingJobInfo.title: GetEditingJobInfo
GetEditingJobInfo.summary: Queries the information about editing tasks.

GetMessageApp.title: GetMessageApp
GetMessageApp.summary: Queries the information about a specified interactive messaging application.

GetMessageGroup.title: GetMessageGroup
GetMessageGroup.summary: Queries the information about a message group.

GetMessageToken.title: GetMessageToken
GetMessageToken.summary: Obtains a token that the client can use to establish a persistent connection over the LWP protocol and based on atomic capabilities.

HotLiveRtcStream.title: HotLiveRtcStream
HotLiveRtcStream.summary: Configures prefetch for a live stream that is ingested based on Real-Time Communication (RTC).

InitializeAutoShowListTask.title: InitializeAutoShowListTask
InitializeAutoShowListTask.summary: Creates a scheduled task to start and stop the playback of a playlist at specified points in time.

KickLiveMessageGroupUser.title: KickLiveMessageGroupUser
KickLiveMessageGroupUser.summary: Removes a user from an interactive messaging group.

ListEdgeTranscodeTemplate.title: ListEdgeTranscodeTemplate
ListEdgeTranscodeTemplate.summary: Queries the list of edge transcoding templates.

ListEventSub.title: ListEventSub
ListEventSub.summary: Queries the events generated in channels to which you subscribe.

ListLiveMessageGroupByPage.title: ListLiveMessageGroupByPage
ListLiveMessageGroupByPage.summary: Queries interactive messaging groups by page.

ListLiveMessageGroupMessages.title: ListLiveMessageGroupMessages
ListLiveMessageGroupMessages.summary: Queries the messages sent in a group.

ListLiveMessageGroupUsers.title: ListLiveMessageGroupUsers
ListLiveMessageGroupUsers.summary: Queries the users in an interactive messaging group.

ListLiveMessageGroups.title: ListLiveMessageGroups
ListLiveMessageGroups.summary: Queries the interactive messaging groups in an interactive messaging application.

ListLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.title: ListLiveRealtimeLogDelivery
ListLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Queries all configurations of real-time log delivery under an Alibaba Cloud account.

ListLiveRealtimeLogDeliveryDomains.title: ListLiveRealtimeLogDeliveryDomains
ListLiveRealtimeLogDeliveryDomains.summary: Queries all domain names that are associated with a specific configuration of real-time log delivery.

ListLiveRealtimeLogDeliveryInfos.title: ListLiveRealtimeLogDeliveryInfos
ListLiveRealtimeLogDeliveryInfos.summary: Queries all configurations of real-time log delivery.

ListMessageGroup.title: ListMessageGroup
ListMessageGroup.summary: Queries the message groups of a specified user.

ListMessageGroupUser.title: ListMessageGroupUser
ListMessageGroupUser.summary: Queries the members of a message group.

ListMessageGroupUserById.title: ListMessageGroupUserById
ListMessageGroupUserById.summary: Queries user information by user ID.

ListMuteGroupUser.title: ListMuteGroupUser
ListMuteGroupUser.summary: Queries muted members in a messaging group.

ListPlaylist.title: ListPlaylist
ListPlaylist.summary: Queries the information about one or more episode lists.

ListPlaylistItems.title: ListPlaylistItems
ListPlaylistItems.summary: Queries the information about episodes in an episode list.

ListRtcMPUEventSubRecord.title: ListRtcMPUEventSubRecord
ListRtcMPUEventSubRecord.summary: Queries the callback records of a subscription to mixed-stream relay events.

ListRtcMPUTaskDetail.title: ListRtcMPUTaskDetail
ListRtcMPUTaskDetail.summary: Queries the parameters of mixed-stream relay tasks.

ModifyCasterComponent.title: ModifyCasterComponent
ModifyCasterComponent.summary: Modifies a component of a production studio.

ModifyCasterEpisode.title: ModifyCasterEpisode
ModifyCasterEpisode.summary: Modifies the configurations of an episode in a production studio. You cannot change the episode type.

ModifyCasterLayout.title: ModifyCasterLayout
ModifyCasterLayout.summary: Modifies the layout configurations pf a production studio. You need to pass only parameters that you want to modify.

ModifyCasterProgram.title: ModifyCasterProgram
ModifyCasterProgram.summary: Modifies the episode list for carousel playback in a production studio.

ModifyCasterVideoResource.title: ModifyCasterVideoResource
ModifyCasterVideoResource.summary: Changes the video source for a production studio.

ModifyLiveDomainSchdmByProperty.title: ModifyLiveDomainSchdmByProperty
ModifyLiveDomainSchdmByProperty.summary: Modifies the acceleration region of a domain name.

ModifyLiveMessageAppAudit.title: ModifyLiveMessageAppAudit
ModifyLiveMessageAppAudit.summary: Modifies the content moderation settings of an interactive messaging application.

ModifyLiveMessageAppCallback.title: ModifyLiveMessageAppCallback
ModifyLiveMessageAppCallback.summary: Modifies the callback settings of an interactive messaging application.

ModifyLiveMessageAppDisable.title: ModifyLiveMessageAppDisable
ModifyLiveMessageAppDisable.summary: Disables or enables an interactive messaging application.

ModifyLiveMessageGroup.title: ModifyLiveMessageGroup
ModifyLiveMessageGroup.summary: Modifies the information about an interactive messaging group.

ModifyLiveMessageGroupBand.title: ModifyLiveMessageGroupBand
ModifyLiveMessageGroupBand.summary: Modifies the mute status of users.

ModifyLiveMessageUserInfo.title: ModifyLiveMessageUserInfo
ModifyLiveMessageUserInfo.summary: Modifies the information about one or more users.

ModifyLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.title: ModifyLiveRealtimeLogDelivery
ModifyLiveRealtimeLogDelivery.summary: Modifies the configuration of real-time log delivery for a domain name.

ModifyShowList.title: ModifyShowList
ModifyShowList.summary: Modifies the attributes of an episode list.

ModifyStudioLayout.title: ModifyStudioLayout
ModifyStudioLayout.summary: Modifies a layout of a virtual studio.

MuteAllGroupUser.title: MuteAllGroupUser
MuteAllGroupUser.summary: Mutes a message group. In this case, all members of the message group are muted.

MuteGroupUser.title: MuteGroupUser
MuteGroupUser.summary: Mutes members in a message group.

OpenLiveShift.title: OpenLiveShift
OpenLiveShift.summary: Enables time shifting for a domain name, or an application or a live stream under the domain name.

PublishLiveStagingConfigToProduction.title: PublishLiveStagingConfigToProduction
PublishLiveStagingConfigToProduction.summary: Publishes the configurations of an accelerated domain name from the canary release environment to the production environment.

QueryLiveDomainMultiStreamList.title: QueryLiveDomainMultiStreamList
QueryLiveDomainMultiStreamList.summary: Queries the dual-stream disaster recovery records of online streams.

QueryMessageApp.title: QueryMessageApp
QueryMessageApp.summary: Queries interactive messaging applications based on specified conditions.

QueryRtcAsrTasks.title: QueryRtcAsrTasks
QueryRtcAsrTasks.summary: Queries the status of a speech-to-text or translation task.

QuerySnapshotCallbackAuth.title: QuerySnapshotCallbackAuth
QuerySnapshotCallbackAuth.summary: Queries the configuration of authentication for snapshot callbacks.

RealTimeRecordCommand.title: RealTimeRecordCommand
RealTimeRecordCommand.summary: Controls recordings manually on demand. For example, you can call this operation to start or stop recording at a specific point in time.

RecoverLiveMessageDeletedGroup.title: RecoverLiveMessageDeletedGroup
RecoverLiveMessageDeletedGroup.summary: Restores a deleted interactive messaging group.

RemoveShowFromShowList.title: RemoveShowFromShowList
RemoveShowFromShowList.summary: Removes an episode from an episode list.

ResumeLiveStream.title: ResumeLiveStream
ResumeLiveStream.summary: Resumes the ingest of a live stream.

RollbackLiveStagingConfig.title: RollbackLiveStagingConfig
RollbackLiveStagingConfig.summary: Rolls back the configurations of an accelerated domain name in the canary release environment.

SendLike.title: SendLike
SendLike.summary: Configures likes in a message group.

SendLiveMessageGroup.title: SendLiveMessageGroup
SendLiveMessageGroup.summary: Sends a message to a group.

SendLiveMessageUser.title: SendLiveMessageUser
SendLiveMessageUser.summary: Sends a message to a specified user. The user is identified by ReceiverId.

SendMessageToGroup.title: SendMessageToGroup
SendMessageToGroup.summary: Sends a message to all members in a message group.

SendMessageToGroupUsers.title: SendMessageToGroupUsers
SendMessageToGroupUsers.summary: Sends a message to specified users in a message group.

SetCasterChannel.title: SetCasterChannel
SetCasterChannel.summary: Configures a channel of a production studio.

SetCasterConfig.title: SetCasterConfig
SetCasterConfig.summary: Configures a production studio. For example, you can specify the name of the production studio, configure the transcoding settings, and configure the recording settings.

SetCasterSceneConfig.title: SetCasterSceneConfig
SetCasterSceneConfig.summary: Configures all settings of a scene. This is done by clearing all previous settings of the scene and applying new settings, including the layout setting, to the scene.

SetLiveDomainCertificate.title: SetLiveDomainCertificate
SetLiveDomainCertificate.summary: Enables or disables the certificate of a domain name, and modifies the certificate information.

SetLiveDomainMultiStreamConfig.title: SetLiveDomainMultiStreamConfig
SetLiveDomainMultiStreamConfig.summary: Configures dual-stream disaster recovery for a streaming domain.

SetLiveDomainMultiStreamMaster.title: SetLiveDomainMultiStreamMaster
SetLiveDomainMultiStreamMaster.summary: Manually switches between the active stream and standby stream.

SetLiveDomainMultiStreamOptimalMode.title: SetLiveDomainMultiStreamOptimalMode
SetLiveDomainMultiStreamOptimalMode.summary: Configures the auto mode of dual-stream disaster recovery.

SetLiveDomainStagingConfig.title: SetLiveDomainStagingConfig
SetLiveDomainStagingConfig.summary: Sets or modifies domain name configurations in the canary release environment.

SetLiveEdgeTransfer.title: SetLiveEdgeTransfer
SetLiveEdgeTransfer.summary: Sets the configuration of edge stream relay.

SetLiveLazyPullStreamInfoConfig.title: SetLiveLazyPullStreamInfoConfig
SetLiveLazyPullStreamInfoConfig.summary: Creates a configuration of triggered stream pulling.

SetLiveMpuTaskSei.title: SetLiveMpuTaskSei
SetLiveMpuTaskSei.summary: Configures custom supplemental enhancement information (SEI) for co-streaming.

SetLiveStreamPreloadTasks.title: SetLiveStreamPreloadTasks
SetLiveStreamPreloadTasks.summary: Configures a prefetch task. You can specify multiple URLs to prefetch at a time.

SetLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig.title: SetLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig
SetLiveStreamsNotifyUrlConfig.summary: Configures stream ingest callbacks under an ingest domain.

SetShowListBackground.title: SetShowListBackground
SetShowListBackground.summary: Configures the background of the episode list.

StartCaster.title: StartCaster
StartCaster.summary: Starts a production studio. If the production studio does not have a PVW scene or a PGM scene, this operation creates and starts such scenes and starts audio and video processing tasks.

StartLiveDomain.title: StartLiveDomain
StartLiveDomain.summary: Enables a disabled domain name. After the domain name is enabled, its status changes to online.

StopCaster.title: StopCaster
StopCaster.summary: Stops a production studio. This stops the PVW and PGM scenes of the production studio.

StopLiveDomain.title: StopLiveDomain
StopLiveDomain.summary: Disables an enabled domain name. After the domain name is disabled, its status changes to offline.

StopRtcCloudRecording.title: StopRtcCloudRecording
StopRtcCloudRecording.summary: Stops a real-time communication (RTC) cloud-based recording task.

UpdateCasterResourceGroup.title: UpdateCasterResourceGroup
UpdateCasterResourceGroup.summary: Changes the resource group to which a production studio belongs.

UpdateCasterSceneAudio.title: UpdateCasterSceneAudio
UpdateCasterSceneAudio.summary: Modifies the audio configurations of a scene. This operation also allows you to add an audio configuration or apply an existing audio configuration to a new scene.

UpdateCasterSceneConfig.title: UpdateCasterSceneConfig
UpdateCasterSceneConfig.summary: Modifies a scene, including the layout, without invalidating the previous configurations. This operation is more efficient than the SetCasterSceneConfig operation.

UpdateEventSub.title: UpdateEventSub
UpdateEventSub.summary: Updates a callback that is used to subscribe to channel or user events.

UpdateLiveAppRecordConfig.title: UpdateLiveAppRecordConfig
UpdateLiveAppRecordConfig.summary: Updates a recording configuration for an application. The recordings are stored in Object Storage Service (OSS).

UpdateLiveAppSnapshotConfig.title: UpdateLiveAppSnapshotConfig
UpdateLiveAppSnapshotConfig.summary: Modifies a snapshot configuration of a streaming domain. The captured snapshots are stored in Object Storage Service (OSS). The modification takes effect after you restart stream ingest.

UpdateLiveAudioAuditNotifyConfig.title: UpdateLiveAudioAuditNotifyConfig
UpdateLiveAudioAuditNotifyConfig.summary: Modifies the configuration of callbacks for audio moderation results.

UpdateLiveCenterTransfer.title: UpdateLiveCenterTransfer
UpdateLiveCenterTransfer.summary: Modifies the configurations of live center stream relay.

UpdateLiveDetectNotifyConfig.title: UpdateLiveDetectNotifyConfig
UpdateLiveDetectNotifyConfig.summary: Modifies the configuration of callbacks for video moderation results. As a result, the callback URL that is used to receive the callback notifications is changed.

UpdateLivePackageConfig.title: UpdateLivePackageConfig
UpdateLivePackageConfig.summary: Updates a live stream encapsulation configuration.

UpdateLivePullStreamInfoConfig.title: UpdateLivePullStreamInfoConfig
UpdateLivePullStreamInfoConfig.summary: Modifies the stream pulling settings of a live stream, including the origin URL, start time, and end time.

UpdateLiveRecordNotifyConfig.title: UpdateLiveRecordNotifyConfig
UpdateLiveRecordNotifyConfig.summary: Modifies the recording callback configuration of a streaming domain.

UpdateLiveSnapshotNotifyConfig.title: UpdateLiveSnapshotNotifyConfig
UpdateLiveSnapshotNotifyConfig.summary: Modifies the configuration of snapshot callbacks.

UpdateLiveStreamMonitor.title: UpdateLiveStreamMonitor
UpdateLiveStreamMonitor.summary: Updates the configurations of a monitoring session.

UpdateMessageApp.title: UpdateMessageApp
UpdateMessageApp.summary: Updates the configurations of an interactive message application.

UpdateMessageGroup.title: UpdateMessageGroup
UpdateMessageGroup.summary: Updates the information about a message group.

UpdateRtcMPUEventSub.title: UpdateRtcMPUEventSub
UpdateRtcMPUEventSub.summary: Updates a subscription to mixed-stream relay events.

UpdateRtsLiveStreamTranscode.title: UpdateRtsLiveStreamTranscode
UpdateRtsLiveStreamTranscode.summary: Updates a custom Real-Time Streaming (RTS) transcoding configuration.

VerifyLiveDomainOwner.title: VerifyLiveDomainOwner
VerifyLiveDomainOwner.summary: Verifies the ownership of a domain name.
